document_data.mainbody:
he House of Spires was a temple devoted to Loviatar, the Maiden of Pain, during the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
The House of Spires rose to prominence rapidly during the midâ€“14 century DR, thanks mostly to the efforts of the temples high priestess.
Queen of Torment Chalathra Nyndra served as high priestess of the House of Spires during this time.
